I'll always miss Bin's sweet smile and his beautiful voice ❤

See? My Moonbin, there are still so many people who love you. We really miss your warm smile. In another life, please be happy, live peacefully with us. We’ll always remember your name and our love for you will always flow, my moon❤
Big hug for Cha Eun Woo ... please don't worry,  we are beside you ❤️

Your friends, family, and Aroha always remember you, Bin. Every single day. But I'm glad that this kind of musical collaboration opens an opportunity for those who may not have known you that well to also think of you these days, or get curious and discover why you were so loved. Look at all these amazing artists singing a song just for you!! and they were all your friends, your family. Can you believe it? It makes me a little envious😂

But to be honest, who could have refused to participate in this project, if just remembering your bright smile is enough to make everyone want to dedicate a thousand songs to you? Special treatment is what special people deserve.

I'm not going to lie, the first few days this song made me cry a lot, but now it's starting to comfort me somehow. The guys did an amazing job. And there's something beautiful and comforting about hearing all your loved ones sing for you, and seeing them being there for each other. Almost everyone was already close but you unintentionally made everyone even closer. Now it truly is an unbreakable bond. You even made it possible for Astro to defy the industry rules and prepare a concert with Rocky! Because who cares who's officially an ex-member? You're brothers, formalities aside, and absolutely no one can break that. I'm more than sure you would have said something like that. After all, that's why they're doing this concert. Because that's what you wanted. And of course your friends had to make it possible just for you. The power you have up there is enormous, Binnie😂You're simply amazing.

People exist as long as they're not forgotten. So rest assured that no one will ever let your time in this world fade from our memories. At least not until we all meet again 💜🌙Smile a lot from up there, Moonbinnie. Love you and thank you~
Rest in peace little angel 🕊️, just know that no matter how much time passes we will never forget you ❤️‍🩹
I like part 1:17 the best 😭 I swear it sounded like Binnie 😭

These people manage to heal the lost of friend/brother. Seeing them sing together like this warms my heart my heart. Hope Moon Bin rest in peace, and the friends and family left behind could live their lives while keeping him in their heart and memories. ❤

What a beautiful tribute to the young man who left this world much too early. I may have not know you or your music, but I do know that you were a bright loved young man. Rest in peace now.  Your family, friends and fans will hold you in their hearts forever. 💜🌹

ムンビンが月に行ってから会いたと言うのも淋しくて涙を流すのもムンビンが見てたら苦しむんじゃないかと思ってしまって…心だけが時間が止まったような2年でした。ASTROの歌も面白いところも全て好きだけど…関わるのが辛いと感じる日も正直ありました。この曲を聴いて皆の想いを聞いて、今までとは違う涙が出てきました。ようやく前に進める、心の整理がいい意味で出来た気がしす。この先ASTROとAROHAが望んでる方向に進むことを願います。
素敵なプレゼントをありがとう！これからもずっと大好きです。

우리가 느꼈던 그 벅찬 감정들이 더 많은 사람들의 마음에 닿을 수 있도록,
여러분의 작은 행동이 모여 '작은봄'이 더 크게 피어날 수 있게 해주세요.

멜론
‘고추잠자리 작은봄’ 검색
→ 재생, 좋아요(♡) 누르기
→ 다운로드 or 반복재생(1시간에 1회만 측정에 반영)

유튜브 뮤직
→ ‘고추잠자리 작은봄’ 검색
→ 재생, 좋아요(♡) 누르기 + 재생목록 등록
→ 많이 들었던 다른 곡들처럼 자연스럽게 플레이리스트에 함께 넣어주세요!

스포티파이
→ ‘작은봄’ 혹은 ‘고추잠자리’ 검색
→ 재생, 플러스(+) 누르기

200이라니 ㄹㅇ 미쳤다... '너는 내 안에' 가사처럼 수빈이가 시온 자리에 있네!ㄷㄷ

1:20 : 수빈이 립싱크로 노래를 부르는 장면은 아직 수빈 안에 시온이 남아있다는 것을 뜻함.
1:50 : 수빈이 달려간 곳에는 고추잠자리 멤버들이 자신의 악기를 들고 있음. 여기서 시온만 없는 이유는 시온 안에도 수빈이 남아있다는 것을 뜻함. (가사 : 가을 지나 겨울이 와도 너는 내 안에)
2:37 : 수빈이 시온에게 안기려 달려가고 고추잠자리가 공연하는 모습이 펼쳐짐.
3:20 : 시온은 팔을 벌려 2:37에 안기려 달려오는 수빈을 받아주려 하지만 그건 그저 수빈을 기다리고 있는 시온 혼자의 망상이었다는 안쓰러운 장면이 연출됨. (겨울의 끝자락에서 널 기다리고 있을 테니까)
